void cvl_draw_point (cvl_frame_t *frame, cvl_pixel_t p, int x, int y)
void cvl_draw_line (cvl_frame_t *frame, cvl_pixel_t p, int x0, int y0, int x1, int y1)

void cvl_draw_circle_filled (cvl_frame_t *frame, cvl_pixel_t border, cvl_pixel_t fill, int x0, int y0, int r)

Detailed Description

Drawing points, lines, polygons, and circles. Currently very limited.

Function Documentation

void cvl_draw_point (  cvl_frame_t *  frame,
cvl_pixel_t  p,
int  x,
int  y
) 
 

Parameters:
frame The frame.
p The pixel value of the point.
x The x coordinate of the point.
y The y coordinate of the point.
Draws a point. Checks if x and y are inside the frame, and does nothing if they are not.

void cvl_draw_line (  cvl_frame_t *  frame,
cvl_pixel_t  p,
int  x0,
int  y0,
int  x1,
int  y1
) 
 

Parameters:
frame The frame.
p The pixel value of the line.
x0 x coordinate of the start point.
y0 y coordinate of the start point.
x1 x coordinate of the end point.
y1 y coordinate of the end point.
Draws a line. Start and/or end point do not need to be inside the frame.

void cvl_draw_polygon (  cvl_frame_t *  frame,
cvl_pixel_t  p,
int *  points,
int  numpoints
) 
 

Parameters:
frame The frame.
p The pixel value of the polygon border.
points The points in an integer array.
numpoints The number of points in the integer array.
Draws a polygon. The points must be given in the following way: points[0] = x0, points[1] = y0, points[2] = x1, points[3] = y1, ... The array length is thus (2 * numpoints). The points must describe a convex polygon.

void cvl_draw_polygon_filled (  cvl_frame_t *  frame,
cvl_pixel_t  border,
cvl_pixel_t  fill,
int *  points,
int  numpoints
) 
 

Parameters:
frame The frame
border The pixel value of the polygon border.
fill The pixel value that the polygon will be filled with.
points The points in an integer array.
numpoints The number of points in the integer array.
Draws a filled polygon. The points must be given in the following way: points[0] = x0, points[1] = y0, points[2] = x1, points[3] = y1, ... The array length is thus (2 * numpoints). The points must describe a convex polygon.

void cvl_draw_circle (  cvl_frame_t *  frame,
cvl_pixel_t  p,
int  x0,
int  y0,
int  r
) 
 

Parameters:
frame The frame.
p The pixel value of the circle border.
x0 The x coordinate of the circle center.
y0 The y coordinate of the circle center.
r The radius of the circle in pixels.
Draws a circle.

void cvl_draw_circle_filled (  cvl_frame_t *  frame,
cvl_pixel_t  border,
cvl_pixel_t  fill,
int  x0,
int  y0,
int  r
) 
 

Parameters:
frame The frame.
border The pixel value of the circle border.
fill The pixel value that the circle will be filled with.
x0 The x coordinate of the circle center.
y0 The y coordinate of the circle center.
r The radius of the circle in pixels.
Draws a filled circle.
